text: have pharista'o'e kahyum ke he luta (a.Sa.) Ame tamara palanahara taraphathi mokalela che, sakya nathi ke a loko tamari pase avi pahonce, basa tame tamara gharavala'one la'i pachali ratre nikali java, tamara manthi ko'i pana modhum pheravi na ju'e, sivaya tamari patnina, etala mate ke tene pana te (yatana) pahoncanari che je te badhane pahoncase. Ni:Sanka temana vacanano samaya savarano che, sum savara taddana najika nathi
